<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/products/{id}/versions/{version_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
